attributes.action: Prevent local councillors from claiming expenses above 1,000 a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most local councillors claim expenses. In Bath and North East Somerset I was horrified to discover that my local councillor has claimed £84,908.81 since March 2004 - March 2008. I am disgusted this is more than I have earned in six years of employment. FoI is a tool we should all be using and the press need to expose these people!
